'''''Mallorn'' 54''' is the fifty-forth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in May [[2013]]. This is the first issue to return to its annual format and the last issue to be edited by [[Henry Gee]].
